title: #1469 Fairytale Fix
itunes:title: #1469 Fairytale Fix
description:
Adam and Dr. Drew open the show discussing a recent article that Drew sent to Adam titled 'The Rise of Gyno-Fascism' and a spirited conversation ensues. They then turn to the phones and speak with a caller who is looking for Drew's thoughts on hormone replacement after a hysterectomy and another caller who is covid vaccine hesitant but has employer mandates looming. Adam also discovers a new variation on his famous 'stupid or liar' theory that he explains to Dr. Drew. As the show wraps up Adam and Drew turn back to the phones and speak to a caller out of Texas who wants to discuss people behaving irrationally.

Please Support Our Sponsors:
SimpliSafe.com/ADAM2
Lifelock.com, promo code ADAM
Pluto TV
